summary: The "Stop the Invasion of Women's Spaces Act" (H.R. 1017) aims to prevent entities receiving federal funds from allowing individuals access to single-sex facilities (restrooms, locker rooms, changing rooms) that do not correspond to their biological sex. Exceptions are made for medical emergencies and law enforcement investigations. The bill defines key terms like "biological sex," "entity," "female," "male," "property," and "single-sex facility."
